posts.post_title: FS/FT: Low Grade T213-2 Coupon Lot w/ HOF's **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello.  I have the following lot of T213-2 Coupon cards for sale or trade.  All of these are clearly low grade and have major condition issues.  Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards.  For 3 or more, I will cover shipping.  Payment via any method you prefer.  I'd also be glad to trade for any other cards I need from this set.  Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions.  Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED:

**ALL CARDS SOLD**

I haven't seen many of these come up for sale recently.  Unfortunately, I have all 9 of these.  Good luck with your sale!

Rick

Thanks, Rick!  Yeah, these don't seem to be showing up too often anymore.  I was fortunate to pick up a pretty large lot a few months ago and these are the dupes I had left.  They aren't pretty, but good luck finding them around in any condition.

Marc

I'll take Ames and Devore....if still available.

Email...... [url]tedzan11@comcast.net[/url]


TED Z
.
Bump for a price drop on the remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
